statements: SELECT * FROM music_genres;
SELECT genre_name, genre_description FROM music_genres;
SELECT genre_name FROM music_genres WHERE genre_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM music_genres ORDER BY genre_name DESC;
SELECT genre_name, COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM music_genres GROUP BY genre_name;
SELECT * FROM music_genres ORDER BY genre_name DESC;
SELECT genre_id, genre_name FROM music_genres WHERE genre_description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT genre_id, genre_name, LENGTH(genre_description) AS description_length FROM music_genres WHERE LENGTH(genre_description) > 10;
SELECT genre_name FROM music_genres WHERE genre_name LIKE '%rock%';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_genres FROM music_genres;
SELECT * FROM genres;
SELECT genre_name, genre_description FROM genres ORDER BY genre_id DESC;
SELECT genre_name, genre_description FROM genres WHERE genre_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM genre_characteristics ORDER BY char_id ASC;
SELECT genre_id, characteristic_name, characteristic_value FROM genre_characteristics WHERE genre_id = 2;
SELECT genre_name, genre_description FROM genres WHERE genre_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM genres WHERE genre_name = 'Action';
SELECT genre_name, characteristic_name, characteristic_value FROM genres JOIN genre_characteristics ON genres.genre_id = genre_characteristics.genre_id;
SELECT * FROM genre_characteristics ORDER BY genre_id DESC, characteristic_name ASC;

SELECT genre_name, COUNT(characteristic_name) AS total_characteristics FROM genres LEFT JOIN genre_characteristics ON genres.genre_id = genre_characteristics.genre_id GROUP BY genre_name HAVING COUNT(characteristic_name) > 1;
SELECT * FROM genre;
SELECT genre_name, genre_description FROM genre;
SELECT subgenre_name, genre_id FROM subgenre ORDER BY subgenre_name DESC;
SELECT characteristic_id, characteristic_name FROM characteristics WHERE characteristic_name = 'Unique';
SELECT characteristic_name, subgenre_id FROM characteristics WHERE characteristic_id > 5;
SELECT * FROM genre;
SELECT genre_name, genre_description FROM genre WHERE genre_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM subgenre ORDER BY subgenre_name DESC;
SELECT characteristic_name FROM characteristics WHERE subgenre_id = 2;
SELECT g.genre_name, s.subgenre_name, c.characteristic_name FROM genre g JOIN subgenre s ON g.genre_id = s.genre_id JOIN characteristics c ON s.subgenre_id = c.subgenre_id;
SELECT * FROM genre;
SELECT name, description FROM genre WHERE id = 1;
SELECT artist.name, album.title FROM artist JOIN album ON artist.id = album.artist_id;
SELECT song.title, song.duration, album.release_date FROM song JOIN album ON song.album_id = album.id;
SELECT genre.name, COUNT(artist.id) AS num_artists FROM genre LEFT JOIN artist ON genre.id = artist.genre_id GROUP BY genre.name;
SELECT * FROM genre WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, description FROM genre ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT artist.name, album.title, song.title FROM artist JOIN album ON artist.id = album.artist_id JOIN song ON album.id = song.album_id;
SELECT artist.name, COUNT(album.id) AS album_count FROM artist LEFT JOIN album ON artist.id = album.artist_id GROUP BY artist.name;
SELECT song.title, artist.name AS artist_name, album.title AS album_title FROM song JOIN artist ON song.artist_id = artist.id JOIN album ON song.album_id = album.id WHERE song.duration > 180;
SELECT * FROM Genre;
SELECT genre_name, genre_description FROM Genre WHERE genre_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Artist ORDER BY artist_name DESC;
SELECT album_name, album_release_date FROM Album WHERE album_genre_id = 2;
SELECT song_name, song_duration FROM Song WHERE song_album_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM Genre;
SELECT artist_name, artist_genre_id FROM Artist ORDER BY artist_name DESC;
SELECT album_name, album_release_date FROM Album WHERE album_release_date > '2020-01-01';
SELECT song_name, song_duration FROM Song WHERE song_duration > 180 ORDER BY song_duration ASC;
SELECT playlist_name, playlist_description, genre_name FROM Playlist JOIN Genre ON Playlist.playlist_genre_id = Genre.genre_id;
